definitions.definition: a contagious disease spreads by close contact between people

examples.text: His enthusiasm was contagious *(= spread quickly to other people)*.

definitions.definition: if a person is contagious, they have a disease that can be spread by close contact with other people

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from late Latin contagiosus, from contagio, from con- ‘together with’ + the base of tangere ‘to touch’.
